translation.en: -[woman laughing] -[Jon] I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: -There we go. Chefs everywhere. -[woman] It says, "everything."
translation.zh: -每样东西都贴上标签 -就这样 -上面写着“每样东西” -世界各地的厨师

translation.en: -Yeah. -Roy likes it.
translation.zh: -对 -罗伊喜欢

translation.en: [Roy] Like, you took my words too literally.
translation.zh: 你理解我的话太机械了

translation.en: I heard you were here before they even opened.
translation.zh: 我听说他们还没开张的时候 你就在这儿了

translation.en: I grew up right here in this area. This store here--
translation.zh: 我就是在这里长大的 这个店…

translation.en: -This was my Baskin-Robbins. Yeah. -This was his Baskin-Robbins.
translation.zh: -这是我的芭斯罗缤冰淇淋店 -这是他的芭斯罗缤

translation.en: -Bittersweet. -I have mixed feelings.
translation.zh: -悲欢杂糅啊 -百感交集

translation.en: But no, this was my Baskin-Robbins, but I'm so happy she's here.
translation.zh: 这曾经是我的芭斯罗缤 但是她来了我很高兴

translation.en: I've been involved with Christina for a long time.
translation.zh: 我和克里斯蒂娜打交道很久了

translation.en: I mean, her first book tour, we did at Chego.
translation.zh: 她的第一本新书推广 我们就是在切果餐厅做的

translation.en: [Christina] You have this book. The publisher's like, "How are you gonna promote it?" [laughs]
translation.zh: 我出了本书 出版商问： “怎么推广？”

translation.en: And you're like, "I have this one friend in LA.
translation.zh: 我说：“我在洛杉矶有个朋友

translation.en: -Maybe I can call him and see." -That's great.
translation.zh: -也许我可以问问他” -太好了

translation.en: So I'm like, "Roy." And he's like,
translation.zh: 我找到他：“罗伊” 他说：

translation.en: -"We'll do old-school bake-sale style." -Sale.
translation.zh: -我们做成传统的烘焙义卖形式吧” -义卖

translation.en: "I got a folding table. We'll put you out on the street."
translation.zh: “我有张折叠桌 你可以搞露天签售”

translation.en: It's like, if you're gonna learn how to cook for a bake sale,
translation.zh: 就好像 如果你想学着做烘焙义卖

translation.en: -who would you want as your secret weapon? -[Roy] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你希望谁是你的秘密武器？ -对

translation.en: -For you to get perspective-- -I grew up on bake sales.
translation.zh: -给你一些思路 -烘焙义卖伴随我长大

translation.en: -[Roy] I know, that's your whole-- -It is my tried-and-true.
translation.zh: -我知道 这是你全部… -屡试不爽

translation.en: I will pull over the side of the road
translation.zh: 我会半路停车

translation.en: to go to a bake sale and spend $20 and get baked goods that run the gamut.
translation.zh: 光顾一个烘焙义卖 花20美元 买些各式各样的烘焙食品

translation.en: So we wanted to use this to, like--
translation.zh: 所以我们想利用这个机会…

translation.en: Take back the bake sale.
translation.zh: 赋予烘焙义卖新的含义

translation.en: Take back the bake sale, and also offer something.
translation.zh: 赋予烘焙义卖新的含义 另外也是

translation.en: You know what? Just pause, and then let's try to make a good cookie,
translation.zh: “你猜怎么？暂停一下 我们来烤一个好吃的曲奇

translation.en: make a good brownie.
translation.zh: 烤一个美味的布朗尼

translation.en: -My favorite cookie… -[Jon] Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的曲奇…

translation.en: has been my favorite cookie at Milk Bar since the very beginning.
translation.zh: 始终是牛奶吧的曲奇 那是我的最爱

translation.en: It was the cornflake, chocolate chip, marshmallow cookie.
translation.zh: 玉米片巧克力棉花糖曲奇

translation.en: [Jon] It's really good.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: Look at how much cornflake crunch goes into this cookie.
translation.zh: 看 做这种曲奇要用这么多玉米脆片

translation.en: -Goes into this. Yes. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -用到这么多 -对

translation.en: [Christina] This is caramelized cornflakes. It's cornflakes.
translation.zh: 这是焦糖玉米片 这是玉米片 有糖、盐、奶粉

translation.en: There's some sugar, some salt, some milk powder.
translation.zh: 这是玉米片 有糖、盐、奶粉

translation.en: You know, people are always really scared of salt in their baked goods.
translation.zh: 人们不敢往烘焙食品里放盐

translation.en: -You need salt and you need acid. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你需要盐 也需要酸味 -对

translation.en: But making anything taste good requires that balance.
translation.zh: 要想味道好 就需要五味调和

translation.en: -This is cultured butter. -[Jon] That gives you acid, the culture?
translation.zh: -这是发酵黄油 -酸味就是这么来的？发酵？

translation.en: It gives you a bit of acid, but the thing a lot of home cooks don't think about is
translation.zh: 它会带来一点酸味 但有一点 很多业余厨师不会想到

translation.en: that your baking powder and baking soda, which are what you use for leavener,
translation.zh: 那就是你的泡打粉和苏打粉 你用它们作为膨松剂 但实际上它们会带来酸味

translation.en: that's where you get the acid.
translation.zh: 你用它们作为膨松剂 但实际上它们会带来酸味

translation.en: [Jon] I don't understand. Wait.
translation.zh: 什么？我不明白 等等

translation.en: Baking powder and baking soda. Can you tell me the difference?
translation.zh: 泡打粉和苏打粉 你能不能解释一下 二者有什么区别？

translation.en: Okay, so baking powder is a leavener.
translation.zh: 泡打粉是膨松剂

translation.en: It gives acid.
translation.zh: 它会带来酸味

translation.en: -[Jon] Okay. -It also helps with texture.
translation.zh: -哦 -也会让口感更好

translation.en: And baking powder is typically double-acting,
translation.zh: 另外 泡打粉属于二次起发的膨松剂

translation.en: so it activates as a leavener when it hits heat the first time.
translation.zh: 它遇热起发 -这是第一次 -哦

translation.en: If it hits another acid, it will react again.
translation.zh: 如果遇到酸性物质 它又会二次起反应

translation.en: -As a leavener? -[Christina] It'll lift again.
translation.zh: -也是起膨松剂的作用？ -对 它会二次起发

translation.en: So what would you add to baking powder to make it lift?
translation.zh: 那你把什么加入泡打粉 让它起发呢？

translation.en: This is a good one! You know the science fair?
translation.zh: 这个有趣极了！你知道科技竞赛吧？

translation.en: -And you build the volcano? -Yes, the volcano.
translation.zh: -你会做一座火山？ -对 火山

translation.en: -Right. -Baking powder, vinegar.
translation.zh: -对 -泡打粉 醋

translation.en: -Vinegar in there because it's acid. -[whooshing] Yeah.
translation.zh: -放醋 因为它是酸性的 -对

translation.en: I gotcha. Mentos and Diet Coke.
translation.zh: 明白了 曼妥思加健怡可乐

translation.en: -Same. Similar. -Same thing.
translation.zh: -一样的 差不多 -一样的

translation.en: -You can feel it happening in here. -Yes.
translation.zh: -你能感觉到它在你肚子里起反应 -是的

translation.en: [Christina] So we add the light brown sugar and granulated sugar.
translation.zh: 我们加入黄糖和粗砂糖

translation.en: The secret to any great chocolate chip cookie is the dark vanilla extract.
translation.zh: 我觉得 所有成功的巧克力曲奇 都离不开黑香草精

translation.en: But you'll also use the white vanilla for other things.
translation.zh: 但做其他东西的时候 你也会用白香草精

translation.en: -Look at--I like that you came in ready. -[Jon] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -看… -是的 -你是有备而来 我喜欢 -对

translation.en: -That creamy vanilla is birthday vibe. -[Jon] Yeah.
translation.zh: -奶油一样的香草精给人生日的感觉 -对

translation.en: -It's the fake vanilla. Yeah, okay. -That's dreamy, fake vanilla,
translation.zh: -那是假香草 对 -梦幻口味的假香草

translation.en: which I would never use, baking these cookies.
translation.zh: 做这种曲奇时 我从来不用

translation.en: But we cream this sucker in total for ten minutes, which is unheard of.
translation.zh: 我们搅打整整十分钟 这是闻所未闻的

translation.en: So in your style of baking, are you using metric? Are you using pounds?
translation.zh: 你做烘焙食品时 是用公制计量单位 还是用磅来算？

translation.en: We're using metric. We use weight to the gram.
translation.zh: 我们用公制 重量单位我们用克

translation.en: -[Roy] Yeah. -If it's a small amount,
translation.zh: -哦 -如果是微量的

translation.en: to the tenth of the 100th of a gram.
translation.zh: 就用十分之一克 百分之一克

translation.en: But most home-baking recipes are by cups and teaspoons.
translation.zh: 但多数居家烘焙食谱 都用杯和茶匙来度量

translation.en: -They are. -Is it part of the problem?
translation.zh: -是的 -这有问题吗？

translation.en: It's always part of the problem.
translation.zh: -这有问题 -哦

translation.en: -With the bread, it's all… Like with-- -Yeah.
translation.zh: -烤面包时 就会… -是的

translation.en: -Bread is all grams and weighed in metric. -Has to be weighed in metric.
translation.zh: -面包要精确到克 用公制称量 -要用公制称量

translation.en: [Christina] You don't need a crazy gem scale. You just need something.
translation.zh: 你不需要有个极其精确的戥子 只要有个秤就行

translation.en: If all three of us made a cup of flour,
translation.zh: 如果我们三个各自量一杯面粉

translation.en: -it'd weigh different across the board. -That's right.
translation.zh: -那重量肯定都不一样 -是的

translation.en: When we write our cookbooks, the publishers maybe hate me a little bit,
translation.zh: 我们写烘焙书籍的时候 出版商可能会讨厌我

translation.en: but I'm like, "No, we're gonna give it to them in grams
translation.zh: 但我总说： “不 我们要告诉读者该用多少克

translation.en: 'cause that's how we do it, and we're not going to be a part of the bad bake sales.
translation.zh: 因为我们就是这么做的 我们不要 屈服于那种不良的烘焙习惯

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -All right, where did you put my egg? -[Roy] I got it here.
translation.zh: 好的 你把我的鸡蛋放哪儿了？ 在这儿

translation.en: Amazing.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: So we want it to aerate for sure
translation.zh: 我们要把空气打进去

translation.en: because the second you add that egg yolk, it forces the emulsification
translation.zh: 因为一加入蛋黄 它就会强迫黄油

translation.en: -of the butter and the sugar. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -和糖发生乳化 -对

translation.en: [Christina] It strengthens that bond. And we need this to be super strong
translation.zh: 它会强化这种结合 我们需要它非常稳定

translation.en: because you know when your cookies… Some of it bakes out lacy and flat
translation.zh: 因为你知道有时你的曲奇… 有的曲奇一烤就扁 烤出一圈薄边

translation.en: -and you can see the butter baking out? -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -你能看见黄油被烤出来？ -对

translation.en: It's because you didn't take enough time here.
translation.zh: 那是因为你在这个环节 没花足够的时间

translation.en: [Jon] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Speaking of lacy cookies, there are good lacy cookies.
translation.zh: 说到带薄边的曲奇 有的还是很好吃的

translation.en: -The chocolate chip ones that are-- -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -那种巧克力曲奇… -对

translation.en: -[Roy] That are crispy on the edges. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -周围一圈脆脆的边 -对

translation.en: How do you get that cookie versus just a regular chocolate chip cookie?
translation.zh: 怎样做出那种曲奇 而不是一般的巧克力曲奇？

translation.en: So when you're making that kind of cookie,
translation.zh: 你要做那种曲奇

translation.en: -and you want it to be purposefully lacy-- -Almost a palmiers texture, right?
translation.zh: -故意要烤出脆边… -几乎有蝴蝶酥的口感

translation.en: [Christina] You're not playing this crazy whipping game.
translation.zh: 你就不用这么搅打

translation.en: It's not about giving it aeration.
translation.zh: 关键不在打入空气

translation.en: It's just about the ratio of flour to sugar to butter.
translation.zh: 而是在于面粉、糖和黄油的比例

translation.en: And it'll naturally bake out.
translation.zh: 自然就能烤出来了

translation.en: -Yeah. Because the melted-- -What are those Pepperidge Farm ones
translation.zh: -对 因为它会融化… -培珀莉的那种曲奇怎么做的？

translation.en: -that they dip in chocolate? -Yeah. Oh!
translation.zh: -他们蘸巧克力的那种？ -对

translation.en: -Those are really good. -[Christina] Why can't I bake those?
translation.zh: -真好吃 -我怎么就不能烤那种曲奇？

translation.en: The most ones you see at bakeries are the chocolate chip, but then it…
translation.zh: 你在烘焙店见得最多的就是 巧克力曲奇 但是…

translation.en: -I grew up on the iced oatmeal ones. -Yes.
translation.zh: -我小时候吃过一种燕麦糖霜曲奇 -对

translation.en: -Remember those? -Yes.
translation.zh: -记得吗？ -记得

translation.en: Those were so good.
translation.zh: 太好吃了

translation.en: I used to load Pepperidge Farm cookies onto trucks in Queens.
translation.zh: 我小时候在皇后区 帮人搬整箱的培珀莉曲奇

translation.en: -Stop it. -[Jon] We were kids in school.
translation.zh: -真的？ -我们都是小孩 对 小学生

translation.en: The drivers would tip us.
translation.zh: 卡车司机给我们小费

translation.en: -We'd wait by the distribution center. -That's a dream job.
translation.zh: -我们会在分销中心等着 -真是理想的工作

translation.en: And we would go pick out their boxes and load up their trucks.
translation.zh: 我们去帮他们搬箱子 装到卡车上

translation.en: -[Roy] And load it up. -Yeah. That was it.
translation.zh: -装车 -对 就这样

translation.en: -[Roy laughs] -[Christina] I love that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: [Christina] This is flour, salt, baking powder,
translation.zh: 这是面粉、盐、泡打粉

translation.en: -baking soda. -[Jon] Right.
translation.zh: -苏打粉 -对

translation.en: We know we need to add this, so the secret to this mixing is
translation.zh: 我们知道我们要加入这个 所以这次搅拌的时候

translation.en: that we want to mix this part of it as little as possible.
translation.zh: 只要略微搅拌即可 这是关键

translation.en: [Jon] Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Christina] That's it.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Jon] Is that all you would mix right there?
translation.zh: 搅拌这么几下就好了？

translation.en: -[Christina] I'll mix this other stuff in. -[Jon] Because you'll do that too.
translation.zh: -对 因为我还要拌入其他东西呢 -因为你还要加其他的

translation.en: -[Christina] These are sea salt bars. -What are the biggest flaws you see
translation.zh: -这些就像海盐棒 -你认为大家日常烤的曲奇

translation.en: in just everyday home-baking cookies? What I see is, it's either too chalky--
translation.zh: 最大的缺点是什么？我认为不是太粉

translation.en: -[Christina] Mm-hmm. Yes. -and hard as a rock.
translation.zh: -就是硬得像石头 -对

translation.en: No one creams their butter and their sugar long enough.
translation.zh: 他们搅打黄油和糖的时间都不够

translation.en: -Yup. -Ever.
translation.zh: -对 -都不够

translation.en: It's like two seconds, zoom, zoom, zoom, we're done.
translation.zh: 好像就两秒钟 搅 搅 搅 好了

translation.en: Yeah. They're probably doing the first phase that long.
translation.zh: 对 他们可能在第一个环节用时很短

translation.en: They're doing the second phase as long as we did the first phase--
translation.zh: 而在第二个环节用时 和我们第一个环节那么多

translation.en: -They're doing this. -you gotta swap them.
translation.zh: -他们是这样 -你要反过来

translation.en: They overmix it, which is why you get the chalky, hard cookie.
translation.zh: 他们搅拌得太久 所以曲奇就会太粉 太硬

translation.en: -Once you add the flour-- -Like, the gluten forms?
translation.zh: -加了面粉之后… -形成了麸质？

translation.en: -Yes. -You've taught him so well.
translation.zh: -对 -你把他教会了

translation.en: You're really getting…
translation.zh: 你真的很…

translation.en: I don't ever tell anyone this stuff because it feels very…
translation.zh: 这个我从不对人讲 因为感觉太…

translation.en: -Nerdy? -Well, no, I like being a nerd,
translation.zh: -书呆子？ -不 我喜欢像个书呆子

translation.en: but the details of it are overbearing in the spirit of something
translation.zh: 但是这些细节让人太难招架 烘焙本来

translation.en: -that should be pure unadulterated joy. -No, you don't understand. It helps
translation.zh: -应该是件快乐的事 -不 你不明白 这很有用

translation.en: because once I understand the principles, I can apply it to other things.
translation.zh: 因为我一旦理解了它的原理 就可以触类旁通

translation.en: Yes. It is funny if you think about that. You go to culinary school
translation.zh: 你这么想 很有意思 你上厨艺学校 因为你得学习那些基本技艺

translation.en: because you have to learn the basic technique.
translation.zh: 你上厨艺学校 因为你得学习那些基本技艺

translation.en: -Yes. -But the instinct is something
translation.zh: -对 -但厨师的直觉

translation.en: that you pick up word-of-mouth
translation.zh: 是你在学习过程中

translation.en: -along the way. Trial and error. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -口传心授的 不断试错 -对

translation.en: You have to learn how other people do it to figure out what your palate wants.
translation.zh: 你要了解其他人是怎么做的 才能搞清楚自己的味蕾想要什么

translation.en: -Yes. -How someone seasons their cookie dough
translation.zh: -对 -你知道 其他人怎么给曲奇面团调味

translation.en: is probably totally different than the way I do it.
translation.zh: 可能和我的做法完全不一样

translation.en: -Yes. -But I also bake like I'm a cook
translation.zh: -对 -但我做烘焙时也像一个厨师

translation.en: because I liked hanging out with the savory cooks on my way up.
translation.zh: 因为我学艺的时候喜欢 和做热菜的厨师打交道

translation.en: You tasted, you went.
translation.zh: 你一边品尝一边学习

translation.en: So all of this ridiculous mass goes in.
translation.zh: 这一大盆都倒进去

translation.en: That's so cool.
translation.zh: 真酷啊

translation.en: [Christina] Chocolate.
translation.zh: 巧克力

translation.en: Marshmallows.
translation.zh: 棉花糖

translation.en: And then, for here, I'm pulsing like…
translation.zh: 在这里 我会采用间歇搅拌…

translation.en: -[Jon] You're keeping it… -[Christina] That's it.
translation.zh: -所以搅拌的时间… -就这样

translation.en: …as short as you can, yeah? As far as…
translation.zh: …尽可能短 对吗？只要…

translation.en: -[Roy] Wow, that was fast. -[Jon] Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 很快啊

translation.en: [Christina] If you look at this dough, it's a very light-colored dough.
translation.zh: 看看这面团 颜色很淡

translation.en: [Jon] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: This looks like a Halloween cookie almost. You could add Reese's Pieces, orange--
translation.zh: 几乎有点像万圣节曲奇 你可以加点瑞思花生酱糖、橙子…

translation.en: You could add so many different things into there.
translation.zh: 好多不同的食材都可以加进去

translation.en: I'm gonna put you on scooping duty.
translation.zh: 乔恩 你负责舀面团

translation.en: -[Jon] Yes. -[Christina] You've done your homework.
translation.zh: -好 -我觉得你事先做功课了

translation.en: Fill the whole scooper and then bottoms it off with the palm of your hand.
translation.zh: 舀满满一勺 然后用手掌压平

translation.en: -[Jon] Salmonella. -[Christina] Please stop.
translation.zh: -沙门氏菌 -请你住口

translation.en: These nice, little mountain tops are perfect
translation.zh: 这样形成一个小山尖 是最理想的

translation.en: because the cookie is largely butter.
translation.zh: 因为曲奇主要成分是黄油

translation.en: And so the taller we can make them, the less flat they'll get.
translation.zh: 所以你舀起来越厚 烤出来以后越不至于太扁

translation.en: They go into the fridge and we get 'em super cold before they go into the oven.
translation.zh: 放进冰箱 充分冷藏 然后再放进烤箱

translation.en: -They keep their shape longer? -[Christina] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 它们会更久地保持形状？

translation.en: -[Jon] Do they cook well-- -And we added so much extra butter in.
translation.zh: -它们会充分烤透… -我们额外多加了好多黄油

translation.en: We wanna give that butter a fighting chance before the heat hits it.
translation.zh: 在加热之前 要多给黄油一些充分融合的机会

translation.en: -[Christina] All right, we're coming in. -[Roy] Hello. Wow.
translation.zh: -我们进去了 -哈喽

translation.en: [Jon growls] Here we are.
translation.zh: 就是这里了

translation.en: -[Christina] And that's it. -[Roy] Let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走

translation.en: [Jon] And what's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: [Christina] This is a super deepened graham pie shell.
translation.zh: 这是一个很深的全麦饼干派的外壳

translation.en: As long as I can add butter, sugar, salt, a little bit of milk powder,
translation.zh: 只要我能加入黄油、糖、盐 和一点奶粉

translation.en: -anything can be a crust. -[Jon] Wow.
translation.zh: 任何东西都可以做成派的外壳

translation.en: So this was your first, kind of, attempt--
translation.zh: 所以这是你第一次尝试…

translation.en: This is my first vehicle of dessert.
translation.zh: 这是我成功开发的第一款甜品

translation.en: …to define the bridge between who you were and who you're becoming?
translation.zh: …定义过去的你和将来的你 之间的过渡状态？

translation.en: Yeah. I was a crazy home baker
translation.zh: 对 我是个疯狂的家庭烘焙爱好者

translation.en: before I moved to New York to go to culinary school and do all this stuff.
translation.zh: 后来我到纽约上厨艺学校 学会各种东西

translation.en: I never wanted to lose that piece of it
translation.zh: 但那一部分我始终不愿意丢掉

translation.en: because I knew there was something there that was true to me.
translation.zh: 因为我知道那里面有种东西 代表着真实的我

translation.en: -The home-baker side? Yeah. -[Christina] The home-baker side.
translation.zh: -烘焙爱好者的那一面？对 -烘焙爱好者的那一面

translation.en: When you're making a brownie at home, sometimes you swirl stuff in it.
translation.zh: 你在家里做布朗尼的时候 有时候你会把一些东西搅拌进去

translation.en: Like, why can't you just put the batter of a brownie into a pie crust and bake it?
translation.zh: 比如 为什么不能把做布朗尼的面糊 加进派的外壳里 这样烤它？

translation.en: Like, why not? The graham that's in the brownie batter will start to bridge
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？ 布朗尼面糊里的全麦饼干会起到

translation.en: what will happen on your palate.
translation.zh: 调和各种不同口感的作用

translation.en: [Roy] Going back to bake sales, the most flaws I usually encounter are, they're chalky.
translation.zh: 说回到烘焙义卖 我最常遇到的缺点 就是烤出来的东西太粉

translation.en: Where is that coming from for the--
translation.zh: 一般业余烘焙师为什么…

translation.en: -The chalkiness? It's bad chocolate. -[Roy] …average home baker?
translation.zh: -太粉？ -…会烤得太粉？ 一般是巧克力不好

translation.en: Yes. Don't skimp on the ingredient, right?
translation.zh: 对 不要偷工减料 对吧？

translation.en: [Christina] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: There's really no substitution for really good chocolate,
translation.zh: 没有什么东西 可以代替真正的优质巧克力

translation.en: really good cocoa powder. The darker, the deeper, the better.
translation.zh: 真正优质的巧克力粉 越黑 颜色越深 就越好

translation.en: You don't just go to the supermarket, buy the chips or the nibs and melt it?
translation.zh: 你不会去超市 买现成的巧克力碎回来融化？

translation.en: I do when I'm using chocolate chips because they're semi-sweet.
translation.zh: 我用巧克力碎的话 也会直接买 因为它不太甜

translation.en: Also the fancy chocolate people don't make mini chocolate chips.
translation.zh: 再说 那些高级巧克力的厂商 也不做巧克力碎

translation.en: -Yeah. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Christina] So take that out of the bowl.
translation.zh: 把这个从碗里倒出来

translation.en: -[Jon] These guys? Okay. -[Christina] Yeah. Let me get spoons
translation.zh: -这些？好 -对 我去拿勺子 这样我们可以尝尝

translation.en: so we can taste it.
translation.zh: 我去拿勺子 这样我们可以尝尝

translation.en: [Jon] Dang.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: [Jon] Wanna lick?
translation.zh: -快点 -想舔舔？

translation.en: You always know who's on the chocolate station
translation.zh: 你一进厨房就知道

translation.en: when you walk into the kitchen because they're always…
translation.zh: 谁在负责弄巧克力 因为他们总是…

translation.en: -It's impossible. You're being covered-- -Me, it'd be my face covered with it.
translation.zh: -不可能 总是会弄一身… -我会弄一脸

translation.en: [Christina] And this just goes straight into the pie crust.
translation.zh: 这个直接倒进派的外壳

translation.en: -[Jon] And it'll settle on its own? -[Chrisitna] It'll settle on its own.
translation.zh: 它自己就会摊平？ 它自己就会摊平

translation.en: There's little graham compared to what you're doing with the cookie
translation.zh: 和曲奇相比 这里的全麦成分很少了

translation.en: because it's disappeared and been incorporated.
translation.zh: 因为都融进去 看不见了

translation.en: Yes. And it starts to break up a little bit,
translation.zh: 对 而且它也开始有点分解了

translation.en: so it's almost like a graham-y brownie batter.
translation.zh: 几乎是全麦布朗尼面糊

translation.en: [Jon] I can see what you're saying.
translation.zh: 我明白你的意思

translation.en: [Christina] One of my favorite things with chocolate
translation.zh: 关于巧克力 我最喜欢的

translation.en: is to play off of the acidity with another acidity.
translation.zh: 就是拿另一种酸性食材 和它的酸性互补 相得益彰

translation.en: And my favorite thing in that space is mint.
translation.zh: 这方面我最喜欢的就是薄荷

translation.en: Mint has a zest, but it also has a bite to it.
translation.zh: 薄荷有股酸味 但也有苦味

translation.en: So we make this strangely gooey mixture.
translation.zh: 那么 我们来做一锅怪怪的浆糊

translation.en: This is white chocolate.
translation.zh: 这是白巧克力

translation.en: You don't have to spend that much money because nice white chocolate is
translation.zh: 你不用买太贵的 因为好的白巧克力

translation.en: -all the same thing. -It's just milk, solid.
translation.zh: -基本都一样 -其实就是牛奶

translation.en: [Christina] We add cream cheese.
translation.zh: 我们加入奶油奶酪

translation.en: Some oil.
translation.zh: 一点油

translation.en: -[Jon] What, grape seed? -[Christina] I like grape seed.
translation.zh: 什么油？葡萄籽油？ 我喜欢葡萄籽油 我们只用无色无味的油

translation.en: We only use a flavorless, colorless oil
translation.zh: 我喜欢葡萄籽油 我们只用无色无味的油

translation.en: -unless we want the oil to have a role. -I see.
translation.zh: -除非你想让油也在里面起作用 -明白了

translation.en: We add confectioner's sugar. I'll let you pop that in.
translation.zh: 加入糖粉 你来加吧

translation.en: [Jon] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: The secret to anything that you want to taste like a great mint
translation.zh: 要想做出薄荷味 秘诀就是

translation.en: is a mixture of peppermint and spearmint as extracts.
translation.zh: 用辣薄荷香精和绿薄荷香精混合

translation.en: [Roy] You combine with the food coloring?
translation.zh: 把它和食物色素混合？

translation.en: -[Christina] Exactly. -[Jon] I see.
translation.zh: -没错 -哦

translation.en: [Christina] We'll take it and dollop it into different places on this pie.
translation.zh: 我们把它随意地摊在派上 东一片西一片

translation.en: [Jon] Look how pretty she makes her top.
translation.zh: 看 她的派多好看啊

translation.en: [Christina] So I'm basically making little cheesecake swirl.
translation.zh: 现在我来打出奶酪蛋糕的那种漩涡纹

translation.en: -Look how cool. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -好酷 -是啊

translation.en: See, you're acting like it's nothing, you just whatever.
translation.zh: 你做来好像毫不费力 一挥而就

translation.en: There's such an effortlessness.
translation.zh: 真是驾轻就熟

translation.en: But this is also, like, years of being like, 10, 11, 12-year-old
translation.zh: 但我已经做了好多年了 我10岁 11岁 12岁时

translation.en: with my toothpick in my mom's home kitchen--
translation.zh: 用一枚牙签 在我妈妈的厨房里…

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: …trying to figure out how to get the swirls just right.
translation.zh: …研究怎么打出完美的漩涡

translation.en: Each one of them is the same, and yet each one of them is a little different.
translation.zh: 每个漩涡都一样 但又不完全一样

translation.en: Do you sell this at Milk Bar?
translation.zh: 你在牛奶吧卖这种派吗？

translation.en: -[Christina] For special occasions. -[Roy] Okay.
translation.zh: -我们遇到特殊的日子才做 -哦

translation.en: And then we give it a little ring around
translation.zh: 然后 我们摆一圈

translation.en: of mini marshmallows and mini chocolate chips.
translation.zh: 迷你棉花糖和迷你巧克力碎

translation.en: [Jon] High-end marshmallows don't always lead to better…
translation.zh: 高级棉花糖不一定能做出更好的…

translation.en: -S'mores. Yeah. -…baked products. No.
translation.zh: -棉花糖夹心饼干 -…烘焙食品

translation.en: They don't. Because they're all natural and all that.
translation.zh: 是的 -所以你想… -因为它们号称是纯天然的

translation.en: So you've embraced your childhood flavors
translation.zh: 所以你会加入你童年的味道

translation.en: -and products. -[Christina] I love the childhood flavors.
translation.zh: -和产品 -我喜欢童年的味道

translation.en: I think where Christina and I are similar in cooking is,
translation.zh: 我想我和克里斯蒂娜 在厨艺方面的相似之处就是

translation.en: we will mix high and low together.
translation.zh: 我们会把高端和低端混合起来

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 对 是这样

translation.en: A lot of chefs, sometimes, are too snooty to do that.
translation.zh: 有时候 很多厨师太清高 不愿意这么做

translation.en: -[Jon] That's a good point. -But sometimes you can't replace
translation.zh: -有道理 -但有时候

translation.en: a old-fashioned marshmallow.
translation.zh: 传统的棉花糖是无可替代的

translation.en: I believe that, like, everyone wants to be spoken to
translation.zh: 我相信 在某种程度上 每个人都希望

translation.en: on some level. Everyone's in search of connection.
translation.zh: 你懂他 每个人都在寻找共鸣

translation.en: And with food, the easiest way to speak to someone
translation.zh: 在美食方面 让一个人觉得你懂他 最简单的办法

translation.en: -is through something they already know. -[Jon] So beautiful.
translation.zh: -就是选用他已经熟悉的食材 -真美

translation.en: -That's it. We put it on a sheet tray. -Beautiful.
translation.zh: -好了 我们把它放入烤盘 -真美

translation.en: -[Christina] Off to the oven. -Is this it?
translation.zh: -送进烤箱 -就这样？

translation.en: -This is the first one. -[Jon] Is that it?
translation.zh: -这是第一个 -不 这是吗？

translation.en: [Christina] Once it gets baked off.
translation.zh: 烤好之后就是这样

translation.en: -We'll bake this one off so it's true. -We'll bake it, but we don't have to
translation.zh: -我们把这个也烤了 这样更真实 -我们把它烤了 但我们不必

translation.en: pretend this is it.
translation.zh: 假装就是这个

translation.en: The other thing we do is, we Jackson Pollock glaze the top
translation.zh: 对 但是我们还要在顶上 淋一层花式糖釉

translation.en: -before-- -Do we have to do that?
translation.zh: -然后… -一定要淋吗？

translation.en: [Jon] What's this you're making?
translation.zh: 你做的是什么？

translation.en: -[Christina] This is just a mint drizzle. -[Jon] A drizzle?
translation.zh: -这就是薄荷糖浆 -用来淋洒？

translation.en: [Christina] And then we Jackson Pollock the pie.
translation.zh: 我们在派上画一幅波洛克风格的画

translation.en: You stand on a ladder above it and--
translation.zh: 你要爬上梯子 居高临下…

translation.en: We just stand a little above it and start to give it the splatter.
translation.zh: 不用站得那么高 就这样随意淋洒

translation.en: Do you want to Jackson Pollock?
translation.zh: 你来波洛克一下？

translation.en: -I'll give it a shot. -[Christina] All right.
translation.zh: -我试试 -好

translation.en: -[Jon] How am I doing here? -[Christina] Good.
translation.zh: -我做得怎么样 厨师长？ -很好

translation.en: [Jon] Now go the other way?
translation.zh: -然后再反着来？ -对

translation.en: -Am I going too-- -[Christina] You're good.
translation.zh: -我要不要… -对了 不 很好

translation.en: You pull it out from under me when I'm going too far.
translation.zh: 我要是洒得太多 你就把派端走

translation.en: [Christina] There's no right or wrong way.
translation.zh: 无所谓对与错

translation.en: Do you want to add to this?
translation.zh: 你想来加一点吗？

translation.en: -This? -Chef?
translation.zh: -这个？ -厨师长？

translation.en: -[Christina] He needs to… [laughs] -[Jon] That's the one--
translation.zh: -嗯 我觉得他需要加… 对 -就是这个

translation.en: You wanna cut into this sucker?
translation.zh: 你来切？

translation.en: They taught me in school the most important part is tasting.
translation.zh: 是的 他们在学校教我 最重要的部分就是品尝

translation.en: -Is tasting. -[Christina] Tasting.
translation.zh: -是品尝 -品尝

translation.en: -[Jon] Cuts easy, don't it? -[Christina] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 很好切 是不是？

translation.en: We bake it. It poofs. And then…
translation.zh: 我们烤它 噗得一下 然后…

translation.en: I don't know about you, but I like a fudgy-in-the-center brownie.
translation.zh: 我不知道你们 但我喜欢软心的布朗尼

translation.en: -Yes. -You got it. I can feel it already.
translation.zh: -好 -你没问题 我已经能感觉到了

translation.en: [Christina] Nice.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: -[Jon] That's really good. -That's a bake sale. They're so good.
translation.zh: -真好 -可以拿去做烘焙义卖了 真好吃

translation.en: Right? The textures are so great.
translation.zh: 是不是？口感真棒

translation.en: [Christina] Texture of the marshmallows on top, I just cannot get away from.
translation.zh: 顶上棉花糖的口感 躲都躲不开

translation.en: I'll go around and pick them off of every bite.
translation.zh: 我每咬一口都要把它挑出去

translation.en: [Jon] It's really good.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: [Roy] Well, we solved the cookie and the brownie. Now, we got the cake.
translation.zh: 我们搞定了曲奇和布朗尼 现在该烤蛋糕了

translation.en: You can't come to Milk Bar without making a layer cake.
translation.zh: 我觉得 来牛奶吧 不能不烤一个 分层的夹心蛋糕

translation.en: -Yes. -[Roy] Layer cake.
translation.zh: -是啊 -夹心蛋糕

translation.en: -Few more steps than a cookie, but worth-- -However,
translation.zh: -比烤曲奇多几个步骤 但很值得… -但是

translation.en: I was thrown when I saw the mise
translation.zh: 看到这些 我很意外

translation.en: because I've never seen that in a layer cake.
translation.zh: 因为我从没见过夹心蛋糕里用这个

translation.en: You're here, so why the heck not
translation.zh: 你来了 为什么不

translation.en: -roll out the red carpet? -Why not?
translation.zh: -隆重一点呢？ -为什么不呢？

translation.en: It's a recipe we've been working on for a few months
translation.zh: 自从我们推出生日蛋糕

translation.en: -since we came out with the birthday cake. -This is the chocolate birthday cake?
translation.zh: -我们用了几个月开发这种蛋糕 -这是一个巧克力蛋糕？

translation.en: It's the chocolate birthday cake because not everyone is here for all the vanilla.
translation.zh: 这是巧克力蛋糕 因为不是每个人都想吃香草口味的

translation.en: [Christina] Mixing cake is like mixing a cookie,
translation.zh: -是的 -搅拌蛋糕面粉就像搅拌曲奇面粉

translation.en: -in theory. -Right.
translation.zh: -理论上一样 -对

translation.en: -It starts with butter. Get it in there. -[Roy] Cream. Cream first.
translation.zh: -从黄油开始 放进去吧 -首先打奶油

translation.en: [Christina] We're gonna add light brown sugar and granulated sugar.
translation.zh: 我们要加入黄糖和粗砂糖

translation.en: And then ditto with the dark vanilla extract
translation.zh: 也要用到黑香草精

translation.en: because chocolate cake should be dark and rich.
translation.zh: 因为巧克力蛋糕颜色要深 味道要浓郁

translation.en: So we take a bunch of eggs, and we blend them down for our cakes.
translation.zh: 然后 加入几个鸡蛋 打散

translation.en: How do you know how many eggs you're adding?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道应该加几个鸡蛋？

translation.en: We weigh them. A large egg is about 50 grams.
translation.zh: 我们称重 较大的鸡蛋大约50克

translation.en: -We try to pour the oil in first. -What's this on the bottom?
translation.zh: -我们尽量先倒油 -底下是什么？

translation.en: That's buttermilk. We layer our oil and our buttermilk.
translation.zh: 那是酪乳 我们会把油和酪乳分层

translation.en: Oil is always the key to moist cake?
translation.zh: 蛋糕要湿润 油是关键？

translation.en: -[Christina] Oil is the key to moist cake. -[Jon] Buttermilk, now you have your acid.
translation.zh: 油是使蛋糕湿润的关键 现在倒酪乳 酸味有了 脂肪也有了

translation.en: -You have your fat. -[Christina] Exactly.
translation.zh: 现在倒酪乳 酸味有了 脂肪也有了 没错

translation.en: [Jon] If it's not looking glossy, what do you add more of?
translation.zh: 如果表面不那么光滑 你就加更多？

translation.en: -You just keep-- -Blending?
translation.zh: -你只要不停地… -搅拌？

translation.en: You keep blending. Again, it's the most common mistake.
translation.zh: 不停地搅拌

translation.en: You don't want to change measurements because it's chemistry.
translation.zh: 不要改变用量 因为这是化学反应

translation.en: -You don't just start-- -It's science.
translation.zh: -不要随便加… -这是科学

translation.en: -[Jon] So all of your control-- -I'll just add a little bit more oil.
translation.zh: -所以 你对它的控制… -我再加一点油吧

translation.en: -No, but we do. -[Christina] Yeah.
translation.zh: -但我们就是这样 -对

translation.en: That's what we do. So you're manipulating all of it
translation.zh: 我们就是这样做的 而你控制它

translation.en: -through time and-- -And it's time and agitations.
translation.zh: -是通过时间和… -时间和搅打

translation.en: That's where things go wrong. Remember when we were making the beignets?
translation.zh: 所以我想这就是问题所在 记得吗？我们做贝涅饼的时候

translation.en: We were adding and changing the ratios a little bit.
translation.zh: 我们随便加料 改变了它的配比

translation.en: -[Roy] A little bit. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -有点 -是的

translation.en: [groans] Du Monde?
translation.zh: 世界咖啡馆？

translation.en: Yeah, but it was three years old.
translation.zh: 是的 但那个有三年了

translation.en: I think I have a three-year-old box of Café Du Monde.
translation.zh: 我想我有一盒三年的 世界咖啡馆贝涅饼

translation.en: No, we got a fresh box, and we redid it.
translation.zh: 不 我们新买的一盒 然后我们重新做了

translation.en: [Christina] This is cake flour, baking powder, salt.
translation.zh: 这是蛋糕面粉、泡打粉和盐

translation.en: [Jon] Now we wanna go--
translation.zh: 我们现在要…

translation.en: -[Christina] As little as possible. -…short, high-speed short,
translation.zh: -尽可能少 -…短时 短时高速

translation.en: -or medium-speed short? -Medium-speed short.
translation.zh: -还是短时中速？ -短时中速

translation.en: We want to mix it for as little as humanly possible.
translation.zh: 要尽可能少搅拌

translation.en: -[Jon] Now, probably stop it. -[Christina] You can stop it.
translation.zh: -那么也许现在应该停了 -我觉得可以停了

translation.en: -Scrape it? -And my method is always you can finish
translation.zh: -刮一刮？ -我的方法始终是 你可以手动

translation.en: mixing anything and everything by hand.
translation.zh: 完成任何东西的搅拌

translation.en: [Jon] So it's folding more
translation.zh: 所以多拌一拌

translation.en: -because you don't want to collapse it? -[Christina] Yeah.
translation.zh: -因为你不希望它塌缩？ -对

translation.en: I'm so proud. I could just retire. You could take my job for me. He's on it.
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲 我可以退休了 你可以接替我的工作了 他掌握了

translation.en: I'm just here for show. He's doin' it all.
translation.zh: 我只是做做样子 他一个人全搞定了

translation.en: [Christina] So the batter goes in.
translation.zh: 和好的面倒上去

translation.en: [Jon] Just do this?
translation.zh: 就这样？

translation.en: [Christina] Yeah, exactly. You're spreading them in.
translation.zh: 完全正确 把它铺开

translation.en: [Jon] I see.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: -[Christina] Perfect. -[Jon] Okay.
translation.zh: 完美 好的

translation.en: [Christina] This side of the spatula is 90 degrees.
translation.zh: 铲子的这一面是90度
